title: In infinite loop with "Upgrading chain index"
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.7.3
OS & Version: Ubuntu

#### Expected behaviour

On ropsten, Geth would do the light sync and would eventually continue syncing the full chain.

#### Actual behaviour

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

```
geth --testnet --syncmode light --rpc --rpcapi eth,web3,admin,net
```

Glad to see I'm not the only one experiencing this phenomenon. I'm hoping that when the bloombits percentage reaches 100%, the sync will be done.

geth --rinkeby --rpc --rpcapi db,eth,net,web3,personal --cache=2048  --rpcport 8545 --rpcaddr 127.0.0.1 --rpccorsdomain "*"

ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/30245/invalid-json-rpc-response-undefined
